ca.mcgill.ecse211.project
Class Odometer

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Odometer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Odometer
extends java.lang.Thread

This class implements the odometer which takes care of updating the values for X, Y and Theta based on the wheel motors tacho count.

Constructor Detail

Odometer

public Odometer(EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor,
                EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor)
The constructor for the odometer which sets the two motors (left and right) and resets the values fr x,y,theta and tacho counts.

Parameters:
leftMotor - pointer to the left motor
rightMotor - pointer to the right motor

getPosition

public void getPosition(double[] position,
                        boolean[] update)
This method gets the current position information of the robot.

Parameters:
position - the current position of the robot
update - set to true at postion 0 to get x, 1 to get y, 2 to get theta [x, y, z]
